    • Uses of IBoard in game.ai.shared.rules

      Methods in game.ai.shared.rules with parameters of type IBoard 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Cell RulesFactory.corner_is_free(IBoard board) 
      void CommandChain.execute(IBoard board)
      If ICommand.invoke(IBoard) returns false
      the successor will execute
      The loop is repeated until there is command satisfying or no ICommand

    • Uses of IBoard in game.ai.shared.rules.specification

      Methods in game.ai.shared.rules.specification with parameters of type IBoard 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cell IRuleCollection.center_is_free(IBoard board)
      Return an empty center Cell of IBoard
      Return null if this Cell is filled
      Cell IRuleCollection.corner_is_free(IBoard board)
      Return an empty corner Cell of IBoard
      Return null if this Cell is filled
      void IChain.execute(IBoard board)
      Apply the the current ICommand in IChain for IBoard
      Cell IRuleCollection.inline_cell_is_free(IBoard board)
      Return any empty Cell of IBoard
      Return null if isDraw() is true
      boolean ICommand.invoke(IBoard board)
      This method is called when ICommand.getCondition() is satisfied
      java.lang.Object IRuleCollection.invokeCommand(ICommand command, IBoard board)
      This method will find its methods that can match with ICommand.getCondition()
      Then executing the method
      If in the collection of strategy has no a break command, the system will add it to user's strategy as last option
      Cell IRuleCollection.opponent_can_win(IBoard board)
      Return a Cell that opponent of IPlayer can win
      Cell IRuleCollection.opponent_has_opposite_corner(IBoard board)
      Return an opposite corner Cell of IBoard of opponent
      Return null if this Cell is filled
      Cell IRuleCollection.player_can_win(IBoard board)
      Return a Cell that IPlayer can win
